title: To kiss a sunbeam
description: Once upon a time, it seemed to Angie that Milind and she could find happiness in romance. But Milind is blow hot, blow cold and suddenly vanishes from her life.Now Milind is back and he is handsome as ever. Angie is once again electrically attracted but it is not a good idea, she knows, to pine over a man who cannot commit.But work throws them together and it seems that the sparks are rekindling. With the gorgeous Sonia making a play for Milind things get a bit complicated.Angie is in love, but Milind does not seem to be. Will Milind vanish again leaving Angie broken-hearted forever?
author: Vinita Nayar
